title: LOST RANK POINTS HELP
body: my client froze during champ select so i restarted client and i reconnected.  after reconnect i was in game then lost rank points by remake/leave. how should i loose rank points if i reconnected in?  can  riot give me my rank points back?

replies.body:
When the /Remake System marks you for inactivity (90+ seconds) within the first 3 minutes of the game, a remake will become available and if the votes passes, you'll receive a loss penalty for the match.

Regardless of intent, a disconnection still sets your team behind for the match. This is why all disconnections are treated equally and why penalties cannot be removed or modified.

Your freezing issue during champ select is likely caused by your client having a poor connection to the matchmaking servers. I strongly recommend you work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to prevent this from happening in the future.

Let me know if this issue persists.

yeah I joined a game bought items went mid asked the riven to go top after she said no i went top and she got killed by the syndra at level 1-2, we got offered to /remake and it passed with 2 votes for and 3 votes against and I lost LP. their is definitely some major issues with their /remake system if they even looked at chat logs for the match they would see that I wasnt dced.

Since you were the reason your team could start Remake vote, game treated your account as Leaver. In that situation it doesn't matter if you reconnect or not, you caused the remake so you got the punishment for it.
It's unlikely that Riot would give you your LPs back, but if this is a common occurrence, you should send a ticket to Riot Support.
